title: Arcade Retroarch Cores
author: Libretro
details:
This package contains Arcade RA core for wiiu that aren't included in the primary Retroarch package and the More Cores package. This is a separate package due to long install time and filesizes.

Please be patient while installing. We may in the future split this package again, or remove it if RA itself on Wii U gains in-app core downloading.

The full list of cores here is:

fbalpha
fbalpha2012
fbneo
mame2000
mame2003
mame2003_plus
mame2009
mrboom
puae
scummvm
vice_x128
vice_x64
vice_x64sc
x64sdl
